reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Accelerated Implementation of End TB Strategies in Ethiopia

description.narrative: Ethiopia - Tuberculosis - Federal Ministry of Health of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia - FMOH. This program has the following goals: To contribute to the vision of the health sector by ending the TB epidemic as a public health problem in Ethiopia.. The objectives of this program are: Reduce TB Incidence from 151 to 91 per 100000, by 2025/26.. Reduce TB Mortality Rate from 22 to 7 per 100000, by 2025/26. Reduce families facing catastrophic costs due to TB to ≤ 25%.. Maintain treatment success rate (TSR) of notified DS-TB cases ≥90%.
